column1: Oh I read your bill with its truckloads of cash for Blue State politicians and leftwing donor interests. The bill mentions cannabis more times than JOBS. Typical. Another opportunity to grift. Now read my bill rescuing every job lost to COVID & getting workers paycheck security https://t.co/Pff2raoob0
Pleased to report my coronavirus test came back negative. Praying for the President the First Lady and every American who is battling this virus

About to join @TuckerCarlson #FoxNews to talk about #BigTech’s campaign to silence a Chinese whistleblower on the origins of #COVID19

I hope any new Republican COVID bill will include help for working families having to homeschool for the first time - with so many schools closed or online and kids at home working families need the support
Proud to report our bill allowing Americans to sue #China for the devastation caused by #COVID19 has just passed the Judiciary Committee - been working on this since March
Democrats in the Judiciary Commitee now complaining that my bill allowing Americans to sue #China for #COVID19 would create “burdensome litigation” - for China! #Priorities
